about_the_game:
Rogue Worlds is a roguelite platformer where you use the environment and creative abilities to overcome challenges. Explore multiple worlds where you must utilise your creative abilities to twist adversity to your advantage. You'll need planning, wits and reflexes to make a way through these ever-changing death labyrinths.

Explore strange biomes, escape flooding poison, outwith gargantuan bosses. Do you play defensively with a repeater and energy shield, or swing into the fray with a boomerang and grapple hook? Do you scour the levels for potions and runes; or do you dive headfirst into the chaos?

Progress Between Runs

As you progress, you can unlock starting gear, optional character perks, pets, and more! You can also see friends that you've rescued along your travels.

The game is still heavily focused on skill, and veterans may turn off character perks or increase the difficulty for the increased challenge (and XP) if they so desire.

F.A.Q.

Let's be transparent...

Does it work with Steam Deck and Gamepad?

Yes! Though the visual Gamepad button prompts correspond to those used by Steam Deck and XBox controllers 🎮! Feel free to rebind as You wish!

Does it work with Steam Deck

Yes, it runs great on Steam Deck.

Is there a story in game?

There's a light story in told through interactions with NPCs and the environment.

“Where can I report bugs/issues/suggestions?”

Please look to the forums, we check messages there each day. Feedback is welcome and there are some excellent community members who are willing to help to.

"Anything else to be aware of?"

  • It’s designed to be challenging, and death may be encountered frequently during your initial runs. Though there is no stunlocking/one-hit demises on the player.

  • Default gamepad controls are slightly different from convention, due to optional 360 degree aiming with right analogue stick. Though buttons can be rebound to suit.

  • Being able to multi-task between abilities will greatly increase suitability.

More Features

  • Multiple level themes. Such include tidal corridors filled with mines, flickering lights, rising lava, gardens lined with toxic and carnivorous plants...

  • A plethora of creative abilities ranging from parkour to cloaking to enthralling opponents.

  • Every object has multiple uses E.g. you can grab that lantern from the ceiling, and carry it around to use as a portable light source or improvised flaming molotov..

  • Bosses that will test both your reflexes and lateral thinking (particularly with the environment)

  • Hand crafted pixel art and animations

  • A unique musical score.

  • Permanent progression: allows you to unlock new items, character backgrounds and more

  • So much more...

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.7 or higher
  • Processor: 64 Bit
  • Memory: 1800 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.7 or higher
  • Storage: 1800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: Supports Steam Deck
